one_reviews_text: That gave me immediate motion sickness.  Besides, I don't think it's a good fit for VR.  This could be fine for a mobile game, or maybe another way to do it in VR where you are standing still.

review_title: Good way to get motion sickness...
one_reviews_text: sitting down, the obstacles have herky jerky movements, but other than that its a good time waster.

review_title: Way better than I thought it would be
one_reviews_text: This game was a lot more fun than I expected.
